SEARCH
Module Actividad_AE02
Package model

Class AdminActions

java.lang.Object
model.AdminActions
public class AdminActions extends Object
The AdminActions class contains various administrative operations that can be performed by an admin user. These operations include user registration, querying the database, exporting results to CSV, processing CSV files, generating XML content, and managing database connections.

This class serves as the core administrative functionalities for managing users, processing data, and handling database interactions.

  • Method Details

    • setConnection

      public void setConnection(Connection connection)
      Sets a new connection to the database.
      Parameters:
      connection - The new database connection.

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection() throws SQLException
      Closes the current database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while closing the connection.

    • isConnectionActive

      public boolean isConnectionActive()
      Checks if the current database connection is active and open.
      Returns:
      true if the connection is active; false otherwise.

    • registerUser

      public boolean registerUser(User adminUser, User newUser)
      Registers a new user in the database by an admin user.
      Parameters:
      adminUser - The admin user performing the registration.
      newUser - The new user to be registered.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully registered; false otherwise.

    • processCsvAndGenerateXml

      public String processCsvAndGenerateXml(String csvFilePath) throws Exception
      Processes the provided CSV file, clears the population table, inserts data into the database, and generates XML files for each row of data.
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - The path of the CSV file to be processed.
      Returns:
      The content of the generated XML as a string.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the CSV processing or XML generation.

    • executeSelectQuery

      public List<String[]> executeSelectQuery(String query, String userType) throws Exception
      Executes a SELECT SQL query on the database.
      Parameters:
      query - The SQL query to be executed.
      userType - The type of user performing the query (either "admin" or "client").
      Returns:
      A list of results, where each result is represented as an array of strings.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during query execution or if the query is invalid for the user type.

    • exportToCsv

      public void exportToCsv(List<Map<String,Object>> queryResults, String filePath)
      Exports query results to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      queryResults - The query results to be exported, represented as a list of maps.
      filePath - The path where the CSV file should be saved.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If an error occurs during the CSV export process.

    • convertResultsToMap

      public List<Map<String,Object>> convertResultsToMap(List<String[]> results)
      Converts a list of query results into a list of maps, where each map represents a row of data with column names as keys.
      Parameters:
      results - The list of query results to be converted.
      Returns:
      A list of maps, each representing a row of data.
